title: Multiple fonts needed!
content:
I need help identifying the few fonts on this! Any help is greatly appreciated. If you don't have the exact font, but have something similar to it, please post!

Font: 

 Rapier, Copperplate, Ragged Brad 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132157/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132157/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_54.JPG) | 1.86 MB |
author: jennmertle

comments.content:
Mobile Detailing: [Rapier](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132157/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/rapier)  
AUTO DETAILING & RECONDITIONING: [Copperplate](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132157/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/copperplate)  
Shine Image: only an alternative, [Ragged Brad](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132157/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/raggedbrad.php)
The phone number is some flavor of Goudy Sans...
